english.segment1: God almighty we give You praise. For we are fearfully and wonderfully made. Sons and daughters we stand unashamed. As we lift up Your name, Oh Most High. Cause You are great and mighty
english.segment2: Chorus: Give Him praise. Give Him praise. Give Him praise. Like this oh, oh
english.segment3: Psalm 9 verse 2 and 1. We will praise You, Lord, for the marvelous things (Youve done). We will be filled with joy because of You. Well sing praise to Your name, Oh Most High. Cause You are great and mighty
english.segment5: Praise the Lord. He is good. Give Him praise
english.segment6: Lift your hearts. Raise your hands. And give Him praise
